message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split, so we can both enjoy a good portion of this money.
Your 60/40 split seems a bit uneven, Alice. I propose a 55/45 split instead. It's a fairer starting point for us to negotiate from.
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but let's be realistic.  Time is money, and we're both losing out with each round. I'm proposing a 58/42 split. It's a strong offer considering the inflation.
Alice, I understand the time pressure, but I'm serious about finding a fair split. 53/47 is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
Okay Bob, you drive a hard bargain. Let's settle this. 55/45, my final offer.  Any more delays and we'll both be losing out significantly.
